original_text: But the king's word prevailed against Joab and the commanders of the army. So Joab and the commanders of the army went out from the presence of the king to number the people of Israel.
korean_text: 왕의 명령이 요압과 군대 사령관들을 재촉한지라 요압과 사령관들이 이스라엘 인구를 조사하려고 왕 앞에서 물러나

sentences.original_text: But the king's word prevailed against Joab
and the commanders of the army.
So Joab and the commanders of the army went out
from the presence of the king
to number the people of Israel.
